name: 422:DIE
description:
Due to technical issues, the embedded videos are not working for a lot of people. Please download them directly from the page!!!

GAME: You've been bitten! The infection in your blood is making it VERY hard to see...and live. Focus and try to find clues hidden in this house so you can gain access to the safe. You've been told the cure is in there...but will you figure out the passcode in time? 

HOW TO PLAY: Use your mouse to read notes. Hold the right mouse button to zoom. Double-click the left mouse button to pull up the menu. Middle-click will close the menu without selecting anything. 

The passcode is 8 digits and related to the man's dead wife. D.O.B perhaps? 

GOOD LUCK. 

(if the video won't run after clicking play, use other play button. having browser issues)

CREDITS: all assets and sounds by me with the exception of the music (Loyalty Freak Music - Everyone Is So Alive). "Everyone Is So Alive" used under CC0 Public Domain.
